subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Boo Weekley and Heath Slocum held their lead at the World Cup of Golf in Shenzhen, China, shooting a six-under-par 66 to give their United States team a one-stroke lead over France and Scotland. The Americans are at 20-under 196 and have led by one stroke after all three rounds.
